Victorinox 12" Granton-Edge Slicer Knife

Regular Price: 
$64.99
Item: IK-532269
In Stock
  Some exclusions apply. You will be notified at checkout. Learn More
See All Related Items
Description Related Items Customer Reviews (2) Q & A

Victorinox 12" Granton-Edge Slicer Knife

    • Granton edge reduces suction for smooth, even slices
    • High-carbon 440A blade stamped from cold-rolled steel
    • Textured glass-filled-nylon Fibrox handle
Use Victorinox's 12" Granton-Edge Slicer Knife for smooth cuts and maximum cutting surface. High-carbon 440A stainless steel blade is ice-tempered for long-lasting edge retention and won't discolor or corrode. Granton edge reduces suction for smooth, even slices. Blade is stamped from cold-rolled steel and conical ground for a wider break point. Glass-filled-nylon Fibrox handle is textured for slip resistance. Manufacturer's lifetime warranty against defects. NSF-approved. Made in Switzerland.
Blade length: 12".
OAL: 17.5".
Wt: 6 oz.


Text Size: AAA
